locations.name: Hakodate Bayside
locations.editorial: Set among Hakodate's legendary red brick warehouses, this Starbucks transforms a 19th-century trading post into a maritime coffee sanctuary. Exposed brick walls and timber beams echo with the ghosts of Hokkaido's trading heyday, while panoramic windows frame Hakodate Bay's glittering expanse. The industrial warmth creates an unexpected refuge where modern caffeine culture meets Japan's northern frontier spirit. The Kanemori Red Brick Warehouses stretch along the bayfront like sentries from another era, now housing artisan shops and seafood markets. A leisurely stroll along the Bayfront Promenade reveals Mount Hakodate's imposing silhouette, while the morning markets nearby overflow with Hokkaido's legendary crab and sea urchin. Evening transforms the bay into a canvas of lights, best admired with a warm drink in hand.
locations.editorial_zh: 这家星巴克坐落在函馆著名的红砖仓库群中，将19世纪的贸易站改造成海上咖啡圣地。裸露的砖墙和木梁回荡着北海道贸易鼎盛时期的历史，全景窗户框出函馆湾的璀璨景色。工业风的温暖营造出意想不到的避风港，现代咖啡文化与日本北部边疆精神在此交汇。金森红砖仓库沿着海湾延伸，如同来自另一个时代的哨兵，如今容纳着工匠商店和海鲜市场。沿着海湾长廊悠闲漫步，函馆山雄伟的轮廓映入眼帘，附近的早市充满北海道传奇的螃蟹和海胆。夜晚将海湾变成灯光的画布，最适合手捧温暖的饮品欣赏。
locations.points_of_interest: 1909 red brick warehouse, rustic wood flooring, harbor terrace seating
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 1909年红砖仓库、质朴木地板、港口露台座位
locations.walking_areas_nearby: Kanemori Red Brick Warehouse - Bay Hakodate
locations.walking_areas_nearby_zh: 金森红砖仓库 - 函馆湾
locations.nearby_attractions: Hakodate City Museum of Northern Peoples
locations.nearby_attractions_zh: 函馆市北方民族博物馆
locations.description: Located in the historic Kanemori Red Brick Warehouse district this Starbucks combines Meiji-era architecture with modern design offering views of Hakodate Bay
locations.description_zh: 位于历史悠久的金森红砖仓库区，这家星巴克将明治时代建筑与现代设计相结合，可欣赏函馆湾美景

locations.name: Hirosaki Cultural Heritage
locations.editorial: Within the castle town atmosphere of historic Hirosaki, this Starbucks occupies a thoughtfully converted traditional building that honors the city's samurai heritage while providing modern comfort. The preservation of original architectural elements creates an authentic backdrop for experiencing northern Japan's cultural traditions, where apple orchards and castle grounds maintain the rhythms of feudal life. The interior design respects local craftsmanship traditions while accommodating contemporary café culture.Hirosaki Castle's iconic pink cherry blossoms create one of Japan's most photographed spring spectacles, when over 2,600 trees transform the castle grounds into a living ukiyo-e painting. The surrounding castle town preserves Edo-period street layouts and traditional merchant districts, while nearby apple orchards produce some of Japan's finest fruit through generations of careful cultivation. The Tsugaru region's distinctive folk arts and crafts reflect centuries of cultural development in relative isolation, creating a uniquely authentic experience of traditional Japanese rural life.
locations.editorial_zh: 在历史悠久的弘前城镇氛围中，这家星巴克占据了一栋经过精心改造的传统建筑，在提供现代舒适的同时尊重这座城市的武士传统。原有建筑元素的保留为体验日本北部文化传统创造了真实背景，苹果园和城堡地面维持着封建生活的节奏。室内设计尊重当地工艺传统，同时适应当代咖啡馆文化。弘前城标志性的粉色樱花创造了日本最具摄影价值的春季景观之一，超过2600棵树将城堡地面变成生动的浮世绘画作。周围的城镇保留了江户时代的街道布局和传统商业区，附近的苹果园通过几代人的精心栽培生产出日本最好的水果。津轻地区独特的民间艺术和工艺反映了相对隔离中数百年的文化发展，创造了传统日本乡村生活的独特真实体验。
locations.points_of_interest: 1917 cultural property residence, Traditional tearoom, Shoji screens and woodwork
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 1917年文化财产住宅、传统茶室、障子屏风和木制品
locations.description: A unique cultural heritage Starbucks location featuring Taisho-era Military Residence architecture. Located near Hirosaki Castle this store offers views of Cherry Blossom Avenue
locations.description_zh: 独特的文化遗产星巴克店，采用大正时代军事住宅建筑。位于弘前城附近，可欣赏樱花大道美景
locations.image_attribution: Photo by Suikotei - Own work CC BY 4.0

locations.name: Akita Station
locations.editorial: Within the modern transportation hub of Akita Station, this Starbucks serves travelers exploring Japan's northern Tohoku region, where deep snow and ancient traditions create some of the country's most authentic experiences. The station's contemporary architecture provides efficient comfort while maintaining subtle references to local craft traditions, particularly the region's famous woodworking heritage. Large windows frame views of the surrounding mountains that promise some of Japan's finest skiing and hot spring resorts. Akita Prefecture unfolds beyond the station with pristine wilderness areas, traditional farming villages, and some of Japan's most celebrated sake breweries. The nearby Senshu Park preserves the ruins of Kubota Castle, while Lake Tazawa, Japan's deepest lake, offers stunning alpine scenery just a short journey away. The region's famous Akita Inu dogs and traditional Namahage folk demons reflect a culture that maintains strong connections to both nature and folklore, making this Starbucks a gateway to authentic rural Japan.
locations.editorial_zh: 在秋田站这个现代交通枢纽内，这家星巴克为探索日本北部东北地区的旅客提供服务，那里深厚的积雪和古老的传统创造了日本最真实的体验之一。车站的当代建筑提供高效舒适，同时保持对当地工艺传统的微妙参考，特别是该地区著名的木工传统。大窗户框出周围山脉的景色，承诺提供日本最好的滑雪和温泉度假村。秋田县在车站之外展现出原始的荒野地区、传统农村和日本最著名的清酒酿酒厂。附近的千秋公园保留了久保田城的遗迹，而日本最深的湖泊田泽湖提供令人惊叹的高山景色，仅需短途旅行即可到达。该地区著名的秋田犬和传统的生剥鬼反映了与自然和民俗保持强烈联系的文化，使这家星巴克成为通往真实日本乡村的门户。
locations.points_of_interest: Contemporary station-integrated design, minimalist seating layout
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 当代车站一体化设计、简约座位布局
locations.walking_areas_nearby_zh: 秋田、千秋公园城堡场地
locations.description: Set within the station concourse, this Japanese-modern store pairs warm wood and clean lines with easy access to the Akita Museum of Art
locations.description_zh: 位于车站大厅内，这家日式现代店铺将温暖的木材和简洁的线条结合，可轻松前往秋田艺术博物馆
locations.image_attribution: By 掬茶 - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0
locations.second_image_attribution: By 掬茶 - Own work, CC BY-SA 3.0

locations.name: Kokyo Gaien Wadakura Fountain Park
locations.name_zh: 皇居外苑和田仓喷泉公园
locations.editorial: Japan's first Greener Store rises beside the Imperial Palace like a sustainability cathedral where coffee grounds become floor tiles and recycled fishing nets transform into art. Glass walls dissolve boundaries between the minimalist interior and Wadakura's dancing fountains while domestically-sourced wooden furniture built to last generations creates an almost operatic sense of space beneath soaring ceilings. This isn't just environmental theater the store slashes waste by 40% through returnable tumbler systems where stainless steel cups circulate like currency in Tokyo's reusability revolution.
locations.editorial_zh: 日本首家绿色商店像可持续性大教堂一样矗立在皇居旁边，咖啡渣变成地板砖，回收的渔网变成艺术品。玻璃墙融化了极简主义内部和和田仓舞动喷泉之间的界限，而建造得可持续几代人的国产木制家具在高耸的天花板下创造了几乎歌剧般的空间感。这不仅仅是环境剧场，该店通过可回收杯系统将浪费减少40%，不锈钢杯像东京再利用革命中的货币一样流通。
locations.points_of_interest: Domestically-produced 100% wooden furniture and coffee ground floor tiling
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 国产100%木制家具和咖啡渣地板砖
locations.description: First Greener Store certified in Japan featuring sustainable design with 40% less waste and 30% reduced carbon emissions plus reusable cup pilot program adjacent to Wadakura Fountain Park in Imperial Palace Outer Gardens
locations.description_zh: 日本首家获得绿色商店认证的店铺，采用可持续设计，减少40%废物和30%碳排放，在皇居外苑和田仓喷泉公园旁运营可重复使用杯试点计划
locations.second_image_attribution: By Photograph by D Ramey Logan, CC BY-SA 4.0

locations.name: Reserve Roastery Tokyo
locations.editorial: Architect Kengo Kuma's four-story coffee cathedral rises along the Meguro River like a monument to the art of roasting, where copper vessels and origami-inspired ceilings create an industrial poetry rarely seen in café design. The central copper cask dominates the space like a massive sculpture, while the building's glass facade dissolves boundaries between the interior theater of coffee production and the seasonal drama of the cherry blossom-lined waterway outside. This isn't merely a café, it's a sensory pilgrimage through coffee's transformation from bean to cup. The trendy Nakameguro district unfolds along narrow streets where independent boutiques and artisanal restaurants attract Tokyo's creative class year-round. Spring transforms the area into one of the city's premier hanami destinations, when thousands gather beneath pink blossoms for riverside celebrations. The nearby Tokyo Photographic Art Museum provides cultural depth, while the upscale Daikanyama shopping district offers sophisticated retail therapy just minutes away. The Meguro River's walking paths connect these neighborhoods in a continuous urban experience that epitomizes contemporary Tokyo's blend of nature and culture.
locations.editorial_zh: 建筑师隈研吾设计的四层咖啡大教堂沿着目黑川矗立，像烘焙艺术的纪念碑，铜器和折纸天花板创造了咖啡馆设计中罕见的工业诗意。中央铜桶像巨大的雕塑一样主导空间，而建筑的玻璃外墙融化了咖啡生产的内部剧场与外面樱花沿河的季节性戏剧之间的界限。这不仅仅是一家咖啡馆，它是通过咖啡从豆到杯转变的感官朝圣。时尚的中目黑区沿着狭窄的街道展开，独立精品店和工匠餐厅全年吸引东京的创意阶层。春天将该地区变成城市主要的赏花目的地之一，成千上万的人聚集在粉红色的花朵下进行河畔庆祝活动。附近的东京都摄影美术馆提供文化深度，而高档的代官山购物区仅需几分钟即可提供精致的零售疗法。目黑川的步行道在连续的城市体验中连接这些街区，体现了当代东京自然与文化的融合。
locations.points_of_interest: 40ft copper coffee cask, origami ceiling, Teavana tea bar, cocktail bar
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 40英尺铜咖啡桶、折纸天花板、Teavana茶吧、鸡尾酒吧
locations.nearby_attractions: Tokyo Photographic Art Museum, Kyu Asakura House
locations.nearby_attractions_zh: 东京都摄影美术馆、旧朝仓家住宅
locations.description: The Tokyo Roastery is Starbucks largest Roastery globally designed in collaboration with renowned Japanese architect Kengo Kuma
locations.description_zh: 东京烘焙工厂是星巴克全球最大的烘焙工厂，与著名日本建筑师隈研吾合作设计
locations.image_attribution: By Nesnad - Own work, CC BY 4.0
locations.second_image_attribution: By Senkaku Islands - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0

locations.name: Shibuya Scramble Crossing
locations.editorial: Overlooking the world's busiest pedestrian crossing, this Starbucks provides an elevated theater box for observing Tokyo's human choreography in constant motion below. The prime corner location captures the electric energy of Shibuya, where thousands of people cross the intersection every few minutes in a mesmerizing display of urban efficiency. Floor-to-ceiling windows transform the café into an observation deck for one of Tokyo's most iconic experiences. The Shibuya district pulses around the crossing with massive video screens, department stores, and entertainment complexes that define modern Japanese pop culture. The nearby Shibuya Sky observation deck offers panoramic city views, while narrow streets leading away from the crossing reveal intimate yakitori alleys and hidden bars. The famous Hachiko statue commemorates Japan's most loyal dog just steps away, creating a touching reminder of traditional values amid the urban chaos. This location embodies Tokyo's ability to blend overwhelming scale with human-sized moments of connection.
locations.editorial_zh: 俯瞰世界上最繁忙的人行横道，这家星巴克为观察下方东京不断运动的人类编舞提供了一个elevated剧院包厢。黄金地段位置捕捉了涩谷的电力能量，成千上万的人每隔几分钟以令人着迷的城市效率展示穿过十字路口。落地窗将咖啡馆变成东京最标志性体验之一的观景台。涩谷区围绕着十字路口脉动，巨大的视频屏幕、百货公司和娱乐综合体定义了现代日本流行文化。附近的涩谷天空观景台提供全景城市景观，而远离十字路口的狭窄街道揭示了亲密的烧烤小巷和隐藏的酒吧。著名的忠犬八公雕像就在几步之遥，在城市混乱中创造了传统价值观的感人提醒。这个位置体现了东京将压倒性规模与人性化连接时刻融合的能力。
locations.points_of_interest: Green ribbon seating design, digital art wall display, scramble crossing observation deck
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 绿丝带座位设计、数字艺术墙展示、十字路口观景台
locations.description: Overlooking the world-famous intersection, this sleek modern store is optimized for fast flow and people-watching, steps from the Shibuya Sky observation deck
locations.description_zh: 俯瞰世界著名的十字路口，这家时尚现代店铺优化了快速流动和观人，距离涩谷天空观景台仅几步之遥
locations.second_image_attribution: By Dick Thomas Johnson from Tokyo, Japan - Shibuya Scramble Square: Shibuya Crossing, CC BY 2.0

locations.name: Minato Mirai
locations.editorial: Soaring above Yokohama's futuristic Minato Mirai waterfront, this Starbucks provides panoramic views of one of Japan's most ambitious urban development projects. The ultra-modern interior design mirrors the district's cutting-edge architecture, while floor-to-ceiling windows showcase the dramatic skyline of gleaming towers rising from Tokyo Bay. The location embodies Japan's vision of 21st-century urban living, where technology and design create spaces for both work and contemplation. The Minato Mirai district unfolds below like a vision of the future, where the iconic Landmark Tower pierces the sky and the giant Ferris wheel Cosmo Clock 21 marks time with neon precision. The nearby Red Brick Warehouse preserves industrial heritage amid contemporary development, while Yamashita Park's waterfront promenade offers green respite from urban intensity. Bay cruises provide perspectives on the dramatic Tokyo Bay bridge connections, making this Starbucks an ideal vantage point for contemplating Japan's remarkable ability to balance preservation with innovation.
locations.editorial_zh: 在横滨未来感的港未来海滨上方高耸，这家星巴克提供日本最雄心勃勃的城市发展项目之一的全景视图。超现代的室内设计反映了该区的尖端建筑，而落地窗展示了从东京湾升起的闪亮塔楼的戏剧性天际线。该位置体现了日本21世纪城市生活的愿景，技术和设计为工作和沉思创造空间。港未来区在下方展开，像未来的愿景，标志性的地标塔刺穿天空，巨大的摩天轮宇宙时钟21用霓虹灯精确标记时间。附近的红砖仓库在当代发展中保留工业遗产，而山下公园的海滨长廊提供城市强度的绿色喘息。海湾游船提供戏剧性东京湾桥连接的视角，使这家星巴克成为思考日本在保护与创新之间取得平衡的卓越能力的理想有利位置。
locations.address: 2-2-1 Minato Mirai Nishi Ward Yokohama Kanagawa 220-0012Retry
locations.points_of_interest: Glass wall architecture, open space design, harbor observation deck
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 玻璃墙建筑、开放空间设计、海港观景台
locations.description: A bright waterfront store with airy sightlines and contemporary finishes, ideal for bayside walks and visits to Yokohama’s Red Brick Warehouse
locations.description_zh: 明亮的海滨店铺，具有通风的视线和当代装饰，非常适合海湾散步和参观横滨红砖仓库
locations.image_attribution: By Thirteen-fri - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0

locations.name: Futako-Tamagawa
locations.editorial: Rising above the confluence of the Tama and Tamagawa rivers, this Starbucks occupies premium real estate in one of Tokyo's most desirable residential districts. The modern architecture maximizes river views while creating an airy, light-filled space that attracts affluent families and young professionals seeking suburban sophistication within the greater Tokyo area. Large terraces and floor-to-ceiling windows blur the boundaries between interior comfort and the natural riverside setting. The Futako-Tamagawa district represents Tokyo's vision of upscale suburban living, where luxury shopping complexes and family-friendly parks create an alternative to dense urban life. The nearby Tamagawa Takashimadaira Park offers extensive green space for recreation and seasonal festivals, while the rivers provide cycling and walking paths that connect to central Tokyo. This area attracts Tokyo residents seeking a balance between urban convenience and natural beauty, making it a perfect representation of contemporary Japanese lifestyle aspirations.
locations.editorial_zh: 在多摩川和玉川河流交汇处上方升起，这家星巴克占据东京最理想的住宅区之一的优质房地产。现代建筑最大化河景，同时创造一个通风、充满光线的空间，吸引富裕家庭和年轻专业人士在大东京地区内寻求郊区精致。大露台和落地窗模糊了室内舒适与自然河畔环境之间的界限。二子玉川区代表了东京高档郊区生活的愿景，豪华购物综合体和家庭友好公园创造了密集城市生活的替代品。附近的玉川高岛平公园为娱乐和季节性节日提供广阔的绿地，而河流提供连接中央东京的自行车和步行道。该地区吸引东京居民寻求城市便利与自然美景之间的平衡，使其成为当代日本生活方式愿望的完美代表。
locations.points_of_interest: Natural wood accents, river-view terrace, sustainable design features
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 天然木装饰、河景露台、可持续设计特色
locations.description: Riverside and park-facing, this modern café features light woods and generous glazing, offering easy access to Futako-Tamagawa Park
locations.description_zh: 面向河流和公园，这家现代咖啡馆采用浅色木材和宽敞的玻璃，可轻松前往二子玉川公园
locations.image_attribution: Photo by James P - Own work, All Rights Reserved
locations.second_image_attribution: Photo by James P - Own work, All Rights Reserved

locations.name: Kawagoe Kanetsuki-dori
locations.editorial: Along Kawagoe's preserved Edo-period streetscape, this Starbucks inhabits a space where merchant traditions spanning four centuries continue in contemporary form. The historic Kanetsuki-dori (Bell Tower Street) provides an authentic backdrop of kura-zukuri warehouse buildings, their fireproof clay walls and distinctive architectural details creating one of Japan's best-preserved examples of merchant quarter architecture. The location honors this commercial heritage while serving modern travelers exploring "Little Edo." The iconic Toki no Kane bell tower marks time as it has for over 350 years, while traditional confectionery shops and craft stores line streets that transported visitors directly into the Tokugawa period. Kawagoe's weekend festivals bring these historic streets alive with traditional performances and seasonal celebrations, while the nearby Kita-in Temple houses important cultural treasures in tranquil garden settings. The short train journey from Tokyo makes this location a perfect base for experiencing authentic Edo-period atmosphere without leaving the modern Kanto region.
locations.editorial_zh: 沿着川越保存的江户时期街景，这家星巴克占据一个空间，跨越四个世纪的商人传统以当代形式继续。历史悠久的钟楼街提供仓库建筑的真实背景，其防火粘土墙和独特的建筑细节创造了日本保存最完好的商业区建筑示例之一。该位置尊重这一商业遗产，同时为探索"小江户"的现代旅行者提供服务。标志性的时之钟钟楼像350多年来一样标记时间，而传统糖果店和工艺品店排列的街道将游客直接带入德川时期。川越的周末节日用传统表演和季节性庆祝活动使这些历史街道活跃起来，而附近的喜多院寺在宁静的花园环境中容纳重要的文化宝藏。从东京出发的短途火车旅程使这个位置成为在不离开现代关东地区的情况下体验真实江户时期氛围的完美基地。
locations.points_of_interest: Traditional cedar wood interior, Zen garden elements, Edo-style façade
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 传统杉木内饰、禅园元素、江户风格外观
locations.description: Located in the historic Little Edo district this Starbucks features traditional Japanese design using local Saitama cedar wood and Kawagoe tozan fabric creating an authentic Edo period atmosphere
locations.description_zh: 位于历史悠久的小江户区，这家星巴克采用传统日式设计，使用当地埼玉杉木和川越东山织物，创造真实的江户时期氛围
locations.image_attribution: Photo by Umioso - Own work CC BY 2.5
locations.second_image_attribution: By Wei-Te Wong from Taipei City, Taiwan, Republic of China - 川越市景, CC BY-SA 2.0

locations.name: Izumo
locations.editorial: Near the spiritual heart of ancient Japan, this Starbucks provides modern respite within walking distance of Izumo Taisha, one of Shinto's most sacred sites. The building's design respectfully acknowledges its proximity to this legendary shrine while offering comfortable contemporary amenities to pilgrims and cultural visitors. Traditional materials and proportions create visual harmony with the surrounding temple architecture, demonstrating how modern commercial spaces can enhance rather than compete with sacred environments. Izumo Taisha's massive shimenawa rope and towering wooden halls embody Shinto architecture at its most powerful, where legends place the annual gathering of Japan's eight million kami deities. The shrine's connection to marriage and relationships draws couples from across Japan seeking divine blessings, while the surrounding Izumo region preserves some of Japan's oldest cultural traditions. The nearby Shimane Museum of Ancient Izumo traces the area's role in Japanese mythology and early history, making this location a gateway to understanding Japan's spiritual foundations.
locations.editorial_zh: 在古代日本的精神中心附近，这家星巴克在步行距离内提供现代休息，距离神道教最神圣的遗址之一出云大社很近。建筑的设计尊重其靠近这座传奇神社，同时为朝圣者和文化游客提供舒适的当代便利设施。传统材料和比例与周围的寺庙建筑创造视觉和谐，展示了现代商业空间如何增强而不是与神圣环境竞争。出云大社巨大的注连绳和高耸的木制大厅体现了最强大的神道建筑，传说将日本八百万神灵的年度聚会放在这里。神社与婚姻和关系的联系吸引日本各地的情侣寻求神圣祝福，而周围的出云地区保留了日本一些最古老的文化传统。附近的岛根县古代出云博物馆追溯该地区在日本神话和早期历史中的作用，使这个位置成为理解日本精神基础的门户。
locations.points_of_interest: Tatami seating area, noren curtains, Shinto-inspired design
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 榻榻米座位区、暖帘、神道风格设计
locations.nearby_attractions: Izumo Taisha, Shimane Museum of Ancient Izumo
locations.nearby_attractions_zh: 出云大社、岛根县古代出云博物馆
locations.description: A unique cultural heritage Starbucks location featuring Japanese Traditional architecture. Located near Izumo Cultural Hall this store offers views of Shrine Complex Paths
locations.description_zh: 独特的文化遗产星巴克店，采用日本传统建筑。位于出云文化会馆附近，可欣赏神社综合路径景观
locations.image_attribution: Photo by Jeremy Bishop on Unsplash
locations.second_image_attribution: By Saigen Jiro - Own work, CC0

locations.name: Toyama Kansui Park
locations.editorial: Positioned within Toyama's innovative Kansui Park, this Starbucks offers front-row seats to one of Japan's most striking urban waterfront transformations. The contemporary design celebrates the park's role as a connector between the city center and Toyama Bay, while panoramic windows frame views of the Tateyama Mountain Range rising dramatically beyond the water. The location embodies Toyama's successful fusion of urban planning and natural beauty, where sustainable design principles create harmony between built environments and alpine landscapes.Kansui Park's futuristic lock system and canal networks demonstrate cutting-edge water management while providing recreational spaces that draw families and couples for waterside strolls. The nearby Toyama Glass Art Museum showcases the region's renowned glass-making traditions within Kengo Kuma's striking architectural envelope, while the historic tram system connects the waterfront to traditional shopping districts. Mount Tateyama's snow-capped peaks provide a constant reminder of the Japan Alps' proximity, making this location a perfect gateway for exploring both urban sophistication and mountain wilderness.
locations.editorial_zh: 位于富山创新的环水公园内，这家星巴克为日本最引人注目的城市海滨改造之一提供前排座位。当代设计庆祝公园作为市中心和富山湾之间连接器的作用，而全景窗框出水外戏剧性升起的立山山脉的景色。该位置体现了富山在城市规划和自然美景之间的成功融合，可持续设计原则在建筑环境和高山景观之间创造和谐。环水公园未来主义的闸门系统和运河网络展示尖端水管理，同时提供吸引家庭和情侣进行水边漫步的娱乐空间。附近的富山玻璃艺术博物馆在隈研吾引人注目的建筑包络内展示该地区著名的玻璃制作传统，而历史悠久的有轨电车系统将海滨连接到传统购物区。立山的雪峰提供日本阿尔卑斯山接近性的不断提醒，使这个位置成为探索城市精致和山区荒野的完美门户。
locations.points_of_interest: Harborside panoramic windows, floating café illusion, minimalist wood interior
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 海港全景窗、漂浮咖啡馆幻觉、简约木内饰
locations.walking_areas_nearby_zh: 富山环水公园运河步道
locations.nearby_attractions: Toyama Prefectural Museum of Art and Design
locations.nearby_attractions_zh: 富山县艺术设计博物馆
locations.description: A unique remote/natural Starbucks location featuring Glass Pavilion architecture. Located near Fugan Unga Kansui Park this store offers views of Canal Walk
locations.description_zh: 独特的偏远/自然星巴克店，采用玻璃展馆建筑。位于富岩运河环水公园附近，可欣赏运河步道景观
locations.image_attribution: Photo by Tachiyamakamui - Own work CC BY 2.5
locations.second_image_attribution: By 掬茶 - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0

locations.name: Kobe Meriken Park
locations.editorial: Commanding sweeping views of Kobe Harbor from its prime Meriken Park location, this Starbucks captures the maritime spirit that defines Japan's historic port city. The modern glass facade reflects the gentle movement of ships and pleasure craft, while the interior's nautical-inspired design elements echo Kobe's seafaring heritage. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame the iconic Kobe Port Tower and the Maritime Museum's distinctive white sails, creating a dynamic urban seascape.Meriken Park's waterfront promenade invites leisurely strolls past public art installations and memorial gardens, where the 1995 earthquake's preserved damage serves as a powerful reminder of resilience. The nearby Harborland district sparkles with shopping complexes and restaurants, while harbor cruises offer perspectives of the Rokko Mountains rising dramatically behind the city. This location embodies Kobe's unique character as a sophisticated port where international influences have shaped local culture for over a century.
locations.editorial_zh: 从美利坚公园黄金地段位置俯瞰神户港的全景，这家星巴克捕捉了定义日本历史港口城市的海上精神。现代玻璃外墙反映船只和游艇的温柔运动，而室内的航海风格设计元素呼应神户的航海遗产。落地窗框出标志性的神户港塔和海事博物馆独特的白帆，创造动态的城市海景。美利坚公园的海滨长廊邀请人们悠闲地漫步经过公共艺术装置和纪念花园，1995年地震保留的损坏作为韧性的有力提醒。附近的海港乐园区闪耀着购物综合体和餐厅，而海港游船提供六甲山在城市后方戏剧性升起的视角。这个位置体现了神户作为精致港口的独特特征，国际影响塑造了一个多世纪以来的当地文化。
locations.points_of_interest: Harbor panoramic views, Sculptural seating, maritime-themed accents
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 海港全景视图、雕塑座位、海事主题装饰
locations.description: Maritime-themed Starbucks at Kobe's iconic harbor featuring nautical design elements and spectacular views of the port activities and illuminated Port Tower especially stunning at sunset
locations.description_zh: 神户标志性港口的海事主题星巴克，采用航海设计元素，可欣赏港口活动和照明港塔的壮观景色，在日落时尤其令人惊叹
locations.second_image_attribution: By Tomomarusan - Own work, CC BY-SA 3.0

locations.name: Kobe Kitano Ijinkan
locations.editorial: Located high up in the Kitano hills among Kobe's most prestigious foreign residences, this Starbucks commands panoramic views over the port city's glittering harbor and mountain backdrop. The location epitomizes Kobe's international character, where 19th-century Western architecture creates an elegant European atmosphere transplanted to Japanese soil. Large windows frame the cityscape below, while period details throughout the interior echo the sophisticated aesthetic of the surrounding diplomatic quarter. The Kitano Ijinkan district unfolds like an open-air museum of architectural treasures, from the iconic Weathercock House to the ornate Moegi House with its distinctive mint-green facade. Cobblestone paths wind between meticulously preserved mansions, each telling stories of foreign merchants and diplomats who shaped Kobe's cosmopolitan identity. The nearby Kitano Tenman Shrine offers a traditional counterpoint to Western influences, while the district's elevated position provides stunning sunset views over Osaka Bay.
locations.editorial_zh: 位于神户最负盛名的外国住宅区北野山丘的高处，这家星巴克俯瞰港口城市闪闪发光的港口和山脉背景的全景视图。该位置体现了神户的国际特征，19世纪西方建筑创造了移植到日本土壤上的优雅欧洲氛围。大窗户框出下方的城市景观，而整个内部的时期细节呼应周围外交区的精致美学。北野异人馆区像建筑宝藏的露天博物馆一样展开，从标志性的风见鸡之家到装饰华丽的萌黄之家，其独特的薄荷绿外观。鹅卵石小径在精心保存的豪宅之间蜿蜒，每个都讲述塑造神户国际身份的外国商人和外交官的故事。附近的北野天满宫为西方影响提供传统对应物，而该区的elevated位置提供大阪湾的惊人日落景色。
locations.points_of_interest: 1907 heritage building, Western-style villa architecture, bay window seating
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 1907年遗产建筑、西式别墅建筑、凸窗座位
locations.description: Housed in a restored 1907 Western-style building in Kobe's historic foreign quarter this registered Tangible Cultural Property survived the 1995 earthquake and features period atmosphere
locations.description_zh: 位于神户历史悠久的外国区修复的1907年西式建筑中，这座注册有形文化财产在1995年地震中幸存，具有时期氛围
locations.image_attribution: By 珈琲牛乳, CC BY 3.0

locations.name: Kyoto Ninenzaka Yasaka Chaya
locations.editorial: Within a meticulously restored century-old machiya townhouse, this Starbucks transforms traditional Kyoto architecture into an unexpected coffee sanctuary. Weathered wooden beams and tatami seating areas preserve the building's merchant heritage, while a tranquil interior garden glimpsed through shoji screens offers respite from the historic district's constant pilgrimage traffic. The careful restoration honors every original detail, from the noren entrance curtains to the polished wooden floors that have witnessed generations of daily life. The cobblestone ascent of Ninenzaka leads directly to Kiyomizu-dera, one of Kyoto's most celebrated temples, where wooden terraces offer sweeping city views without a single nail in their construction. The surrounding Higashiyama district preserves the atmosphere of old Japan through narrow streets lined with traditional craft shops, incense vendors, and tea houses that have served pilgrims for centuries. Evening brings magical transformation as paper lanterns illuminate the stone pathways, creating an ethereal backdrop for the short walk to nearby Yasaka Shrine.
locations.editorial_zh: 在精心修复的百年町家内，这家星巴克将传统京都建筑转变为意想不到的咖啡圣地。风化的木梁和榻榻米座位区保留了建筑的商人遗产，而通过障子屏风瞥见的宁静内部花园为历史区不断的朝圣交通提供喘息。精心修复尊重每一个原始细节，从暖帘入口窗帘到见证几代日常生活的抛光木地板。二年坂的鹅卵石上升直接通往清水寺，这是京都最受尊敬的寺庙之一，木制露台提供全景城市景观，其结构中没有一颗钉子。周围的东山区通过排列传统工艺品店、香供应商和数百年来为朝圣者提供服务的茶馆的狭窄街道保留旧日本的氛围。夜晚带来神奇的转变，纸灯笼照亮石头小径，为前往附近八坂神社的短途步行创造一个空灵的背景。
locations.points_of_interest: Traditional tatami seating area, noren curtains, Japanese garden view
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 传统榻榻米座位区、暖帘、日本庭园景观
locations.description: Housed in a renovated 100-year-old traditional Japanese townhouse this Starbucks preserves many original architectural elements while blending in modern coffee culture
locations.description_zh: 位于修复的100年传统日本町家中，这家星巴克在融合现代咖啡文化的同时保留了许多原始建筑元素
locations.second_image_attribution: By Martin Falbisoner - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0

locations.name: Kyoto Sanjo Ohashi
locations.editorial: At the historic terminus of the ancient Tokaido highway, this Starbucks occupies a location where travelers have paused for refreshment for over 400 years. The Sanjo Ohashi bridge crossing of the Kamogawa River marks the end of the famous route between Tokyo and Kyoto, making this café a modern interpretation of traditional rest stops that served weary pilgrims and merchants. Contemporary design elements respect the area's historical significance while providing comfort for modern urban explorers. The Sanjo district buzzes with contemporary Kyoto life, where traditional shopping arcades shelter everything from artisan crafts to cutting-edge fashion within walking distance of major temples and cultural sites. The nearby Gion entertainment quarter preserves geisha culture along narrow streets lined with exclusive tea houses, while the Kamogawa River's stone banks provide romantic evening strolls beneath paper lanterns. This central location connects visitors to both Kyoto's ancient spiritual sites and its vibrant contemporary culture, embodying the city's seamless blend of preservation and innovation.
locations.editorial_zh: 在古代东海道公路的历史终点，这家星巴克占据一个位置，旅行者在这里停下来休息超过400年。三条大桥跨越鸭川标志着东京和京都之间著名路线的终点，使这家咖啡馆成为传统休息站的现代诠释，为疲惫的朝圣者和商人提供服务。当代设计元素尊重该地区的历史意义，同时为现代城市探险家提供舒适。三条区充满当代京都生活的嗡嗡声，传统购物拱廊在步行距离主要寺庙和文化遗址内保护从工匠工艺到尖端时尚的一切。附近的祗园娱乐区沿着狭窄的街道保留艺伎文化，排列着独家茶馆，而鸭川的石岸在纸灯笼下提供浪漫的夜晚漫步。这个中心位置将游客连接到京都的古代精神遗址和充满活力的当代文化，体现了城市保护与创新的无缝融合。
locations.points_of_interest: Outdoor terrace seating, river-view lounge, historic bridge proximity
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 户外露台座位、河景休息室、历史桥梁接近
locations.description: Popular riverside location featuring an outdoor terrace overlooking the scenic Kamogawa River especially beautiful during cherry blossom season and summer evening dining
locations.description_zh: 受欢迎的河畔位置，设有俯瞰风景如画的鸭川的户外露台，在樱花季节和夏季晚餐时尤其美丽

locations.name: Fukuoka Ohori Park
locations.editorial: Embracing sustainable design principles within Fukuoka's beloved Ohori Park, this Starbucks demonstrates how modern architecture can harmonize with nature. Floor-to-ceiling windows dissolve boundaries between interior comfort and the park's serene lake views, while eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient systems showcase Japan's commitment to environmental stewardship. It's a space that breathes with the rhythm of the surrounding landscape. The Ohori Park jogging circuit draws early morning runners and evening strollers around a pristine lake that reflects the changing sky like a mirror. Traditional Japanese garden paths wind through carefully curated landscapes, leading to tea houses and artistic installations. This urban oasis in Fukuoka's heart offers respite from city life, where the gentle lapping of water provides nature's soundtrack to urban contemplation.
locations.editorial_zh: 在福冈心爱的大濠公园内拥抱可持续设计原则，这家星巴克展示了现代建筑如何与自然和谐相处。落地窗融化了室内舒适与公园宁静湖景之间的界限，而环保材料和节能系统展示了日本对环境管理的承诺。这是一个与周围景观节奏呼吸的空间。大濠公园慢跑环路吸引早晨跑步者和晚上散步者围绕像镜子一样反映变化天空的原始湖泊。传统日本花园小径蜿蜒穿过精心策划的景观，通往茶馆和艺术装置。福冈心脏的这个城市绿洲提供城市生活的喘息，温柔的水声为城市沉思提供自然配乐。
locations.points_of_interest: Lakeside glass façade, park-integrated seating, natural light emphasis
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 湖畔玻璃外观、公园一体化座位、自然光强调
locations.description: Second park-based Starbucks in Japan featuring environmentally conscious design with sustainable materials and panoramic views of the scenic Ohori Park lake popular with joggers and families
locations.description_zh: 日本第二家基于公园的星巴克，采用环保设计和可持续材料，可欣赏风景如画的大濠公园湖泊全景，深受慢跑者和家庭欢迎
locations.image_attribution: By そらみみ - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0
locations.second_image_attribution: By MK Products - Own work, CC BY-SA 3.0

locations.name: Dazaifu Architectural Landmark
locations.editorial: Kengo Kuma's masterpiece of interwoven cedar creates a flowing wooden canopy that guides pilgrims from the sacred precincts of Dazaifu Tenmangu into a space of contemporary contemplation. Over 2,000 precisely cut timber slats layer like fallen leaves, filtering light and creating intimate spaces within the larger architectural gesture. The design responds to the shrine's spiritual gravity while asserting its own quiet modernism, demonstrating how contemporary architecture can honor rather than compete with ancient traditions. Dazaifu Tenmangu draws millions of annual visitors seeking academic success and spiritual guidance at one of Japan's most important Shinto shrines dedicated to learning. The approach through traditional shopping streets lined with umegae mochi vendors and craft shops preserves the atmosphere of religious pilgrimage, while the shrine's extensive plum groves burst into fragrant bloom each February. The nearby Kyushu National Museum showcases the region's role as Japan's historic gateway to continental Asia, completing a cultural experience that spans centuries of Japanese spiritual and intellectual tradition.
locations.editorial_zh: 隈研吾的杰作，交织的杉木创造流动的木制树冠，引导朝圣者从太宰府天满宫的神圣场所进入当代沉思的空间。超过2000根精确切割的木条像落叶一样层叠，过滤光线并在更大的建筑姿态中创造亲密空间。设计响应神社的精神引力，同时主张自己安静的现代主义，展示当代建筑如何尊重而不是与古代传统竞争。太宰府天满宫吸引数百万年度游客在日本最重要的神道神社之一寻求学术成功和精神指导，致力于学习。通过传统购物街的方法排列着梅枝饼供应商和工艺品店，保留宗教朝圣的氛围，而神社广泛的梅树林每年二月爆发芬芳的花朵。附近的九州国立博物馆展示该地区作为日本历史通往大陆亚洲门户的作用,完成了跨越数百年日本精神和知识传统的文化体验。
locations.points_of_interest: Kengo Kuma’s signature wooden latticework echoing Shinto shrine aesthetics
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 隈研吾标志性木格栅呼应神道神社美学
locations.description: A unique architectural landmark Starbucks location featuring Wood Lattice (Kengo Kuma) architecture. Located near Kyushu National Museum this store offers views of Omotesando Shopping Street
locations.description_zh: 独特的建筑地标星巴克店，采用木格栅(隈研吾)建筑。位于九州国立博物馆附近，可欣赏表参道购物街景观
locations.image_attribution: By Karl Baron - Starbucks Fukuoka, CC BY 2.0
locations.second_image_attribution: By そらみみ - Own work, CC BY-SA 3.0

locations.name: Kagoshima Sengan-en
locations.editorial: Within the grounds of the magnificent Sengan-en garden, this Starbucks offers front-row seats to one of Japan's most dramatic natural theaters, where the active Sakurajima volcano provides a constantly changing backdrop. The traditional Japanese architecture harmonizes with the garden's 17th-century landscape design, creating a space where visitors can contemplate both human artistry and natural power. The location transforms the simple act of drinking coffee into a meditation on the relationship between culture and nature. The Sengan-en garden unfolds across 50,000 square meters of meticulously designed landscapes, where borrowed scenery techniques incorporate Sakurajima's volcanic peak into the garden's composition. The adjacent Shoko Shuseikan Museum chronicles the innovative Shimadzu clan's contributions to Japan's modernization, while traditional walking paths lead through bamboo groves and past pristine water features. This UNESCO World Heritage site demonstrates the Japanese genius for creating harmony between built environments and natural landscapes.
locations.editorial_zh: 在壮丽的仙岩园庭园内，这家星巴克为日本最戏剧性的自然剧院之一提供前排座位，活跃的樱岛火山提供不断变化的背景。传统日本建筑与庭园的17世纪景观设计和谐相处，创造一个空间，游客可以沉思人类艺术和自然力量。该位置将喝咖啡的简单行为转变为对文化与自然之间关系的冥想。仙岩园庭园在50000平方米精心设计的景观中展开，借景技术将樱岛的火山峰纳入庭园的构成。相邻的尚古集成馆博物馆记录了创新的岛津氏族对日本现代化的贡献，而传统步行道通过竹林和原始水景。这个联合国教科文组织世界遗产遗址展示了日本在建筑环境和自然景观之间创造和谐的天才。
locations.points_of_interest: Historic garden location, Shoin-style interior, volcano-view terrace
locations.points_of_interest_zh: 历史庭园位置、书院风格内饰、火山景观露台
locations.description: Located within the historic Sengan-en Garden complex offering spectacular views of Sakurajima volcano while combining traditional garden aesthetics with coffee culture requires garden admission
locations.description_zh: 位于历史悠久的仙岩园综合体内，可欣赏樱岛火山的壮观景色，同时将传统庭园美学与咖啡文化相结合，需要庭园门票
locations.image_attribution: By Sanjo - Own work CC BY-SA 4.0
locations.second_image_attribution: By Christophe95 - Own work, CC BY-SA 4.0
